item.title: The top 6 exercises this strength coach thinks everyone should do to stay fit
item.description: These foundational movements are essential to keep you strong and stable.

item.title: The ‘menopause penalty’: Many women in midlife see a drop in wages, new study finds
item.description: A new study asserts that women experience a drop in earnings at the end of their child-bearing years.

item.description: President Trump has turned a central precept of American diplomacy on its head, embracing fellow leaders who abandon democratic principles.

item.title: Wall Street changes its tune on China as DeepSeek and policy hopes win back investors: ‘Confidence does feel like it’s returned’
item.description: “Absolutely [China] is investable,” said Jenny Johnson, CEO of Franklin Templeton, in Hong Kong on Thursday.

item.title: 4 Killed and Hundreds Rescued From Flooding in South Texas and Mexico
item.description: More than 20 inches of rain — about a half-year’s worth — fell in some areas near the border on Thursday and Friday.

item.title: Top FDA Vaccine Official Resigns, Citing Kennedy’s ‘Misinformation and Lies’
item.description: Dr. Peter Marks, a veteran of the agency, wrote that undermining confidence in vaccines is irresponsible and a danger to public health.

item.title: In Japan, an Iceless Lake and an Absent God Sound an Ancient Warning
item.description: For centuries, residents in central Japan have chronicled a mysterious natural phenomenon in winter. They see its disappearance as a bad omen.
